Title: Project planning and controlling in Samarinda-balikpapan toll road projects
Affiliations: Civil Engineering Department, Faculty of Engineering, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Andika, R., Civil Engineering Department, Faculty of Engineering, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Dinariana, D., Civil Engineering Department, Faculty of Engineering, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Samarinda to Balikpapan Toll Road Project is the important project because it can help people on Samarinda or Balikpapan so there is need controlling on cost and time therefore it needs more attention to do the planning and controlling for the simple flats project with an assistance from Microsoft Project to do the planning, scheduling, and controlling to prevent a delay on duration and project deviation by using crashing method. Deviation that happens on Toll Roads project will be classified based on the impact of the deviation. © 2020 by Advance Scientific Research.
Author Keywords: Controlling; Crashing; Microsoft Project; Planning; Scheduling; Toll Road Project
References: Ahuja, H. N., Dozzi, S. P., Abourizk, S. M., (1994) PROJECT MANAGEMENT: TECHNIQUES IN PLANNING AND CONTROLLING CONSTRUCTION PROJECTS, , Canada: John Wiley & Sons, Inc; Ahmad Dahlan, Y.
